What is a Merchant Cash Advance?

A merchant cash advance is a fast funding product that will generally allow a business to get funding out to 10-20% of their annual revenue. Capital can be wired into your business checking account in as little as 24 hours from the time you submit an application. There is no collateral, and it is not a credit driven product (although a better FICO always helps). Programs are based off of revenue, business performance, and background. $10,000 per month is minimum revenue. Pay back is set up with an automatic ACH, split, or lock box.
 
*All for-profit companies in the United States may apply for an MCA. Your business must be existing for at least 6 months.

Benefits of a MCA

You receive funding for your business right away, no collateral. Banks take weeks sometimes months to provide capital, and many business owners don’t even have the luxury of qualifying with a bank. It’s a chance for businesses to grow with large sums of cash available.

Instructions

Fill out the questionnaire, and send 4 months of business bank statements. If your business processes credit cards you may also send 2 months of credit card statements as well. If you are a seasonal business send us 12 months of bank statements.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_url=”https://bccapital.info/application/” button_text=”Apply Today With BC Capital” button_alignment=”left” _builder_version=”4.10.8″ _module_preset=”default” custom_button=”on” button_text_color=”#6D6E70″ button_border_color=”#6D6E70″ button_use_icon=”off” custom_margin=”||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_button][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.13.0″ _module_preset=”default” text_font_size=”25px” custom_margin=”-20px||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}” global_module=”2893″ theme_builder_area=”post_content”]

Call: 800-515-4126

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”3_5,2_5″ _builder_version=”4.11.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”3_5″ _builder_version=”4.11.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.11.3″ _module_preset=”default” text_line_height=”1.8em” header_2_font=”|800|||||||” header_3_font=”|800|||||||” header_4_font=”|800|||||||” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Funding by State

Each state varies with certain lending laws in effect, but the good news is we aren’t giving you a collateralized business loan. We are giving you an advance which is a purchase agreement of your future receivables. Payback is calculated on a monthly remit %’age rather than an APR like that of a bank. Also, unlike a bank the capital is unsecured, and interest is tax deductible.

With that being said we fund all 50 states utilizing the appropriate investing partner(s). Some investors may not be available in certain states, but we have at least 3 partner investors for any state. We also can fund Canada, Puerto Rico, various places south of the U.S border, and South Africa to qualified businesses.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”2_5″ _builder_version=”4.11.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image src=”https://bccapital.info/wp-content/uploads/2021/10/Happy-Financial-Customers.jpg” alt=”Medical clients for Merchant Cash Advance” title_text=”Happy Financial Customers” _builder_version=”4.11.3″ _module_preset=”default” border_radii=”on|2px|2px|2px|2px” box_shadow_style=”preset3″ global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.11.3″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”23px|||||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.11.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.11.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Preferred Industries

What makes us a great, and effective company is that we can provide funding for all for-profit industries in the United States. Certainly, we reserve the right to deny service to any business we find unethical or inappropriate, but we’re here to help build America!

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_4,1_4,1_2″ _builder_version=”4.11.3″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”6px|||||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”4.11.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.11.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

  • Medical related
  • Dental
  • Construction
  • Wholesale
  • Retail
  • Manufacturer
  • Staffing
  • Autobody shop
  • Landscaping
  • Restaurants
  • Pharmacy
  • Salon

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”4.11.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.11.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Our riskier industries

  • Trucking
  • Logistics
  • Real estate
  • Night clubs
  • Car dealers
  • Bail bonds

Restricted industries

  • Would be banks
  • Other funding institutions
  • Non-profit entities

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.11.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.11.3″ _module_preset=”default” custom_margin=”||6px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”]

We do have specialty programs for law firms, ask about funding for lawyers if you’re an attorney!

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_image src=”https://bccapital.info/wp-content/uploads/2021/09/BC-Capital.png” alt=”Best Connect Capital Finance Company” title_text=”BC Capital” _builder_version=”4.11.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][et_pb_button button_url=”#” button_text=”Apply Today With BC Capital” button_alignment=”left” _builder_version=”4.10.3″ _module_preset=”default” custom_button=”on” button_text_color=”#6D6E70″ button_border_color=”#6D6E70″ button_use_icon=”off” custom_margin=”||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.11.3″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”19px||11px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.11.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_divider color=”#F1B821″ _builder_version=”4.11.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.11.3″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#696969″ custom_padding=”25px|25px|25px|25px|true|true” border_radii=”on|2px|2px|2px|2px” border_width_all=”1px” box_shadow_style=”preset3″ box_shadow_color=”#070A13″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.11.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.11.3″ _module_preset=”default” text_text_color=”#FFFFFF” text_font_size=”17px” text_letter_spacing=”1px” text_line_height=”2em” header_2_text_color=”#FFFFFF” text_text_shadow_style=”preset2″ header_2_text_shadow_style=”preset2″ global_colors_info=”{}”]

2nd’ary Option

Cash Advance Based Off of Credit Card Sales:

If you are a business like a restaurant, retailer, or pharmacy that processes mainly credit cards for customer payments, we do have another funding option for you. Our 2nd option is called a credit card split where rather than automatically debiting a set payback, we base the payback off your credit card sales.

To be more specific the payback on an advance will come out of a daily credit card sale %’age. It could be 10% or more of your daily credit card sales that get remitted for the payback on an advance. So, for busy days more capital may come out of the receipts for payback, and on less busy days less would be remit.

Click the link below if you’d like to apply for a working capital program based on credit card sales.
